metadata.title: CVE-2013-4142 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2013-3969. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2013-3969.  Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2013-3969 instead of this candidate.  Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
